ygData.subject: Re: MAlice and Blacknightmare
ygData.msgSnippet: Malice:  I guess so, but when things have calmed, there is a lot of tension between all factions.  We, need to wait. Blacknightmare: yes said the

Malice:  "I guess so, but when things have calmed, there is a lot of 
tension between all factions.  We, need to wait."
Blacknightmare: "yes"said the femme"Perhaps we shoul, we also have 
to find a place where go... I doub that Maximals would receive 
Hellplague and me "
Malice:  "You let me worry about that.  I'll take care of it."
BlackNightmare:  "What are you planned to do? can I know it?"said 
the femme
Malice:  "I was thinking of contacting the Maximals, and meeting my 
sister in an area of our choosing, o see if it will help recover my 
memory, and negotiate an alliance or something, so we don't have to 
fight each other."
Blacknightmare: "They will receive you 'cause you're a lost 
friend... but we're the enemie, and still I feel able to be 
evil"replied the femme
Malice:  The male fell silent.  He did not like what he was hearing.
Blacknightmare: The femme rested her head in Malice's shoulder and 
fell in silence
Malice:  "Good, bad, rightous, evil.  What is the differance?  Is 
there one?  Why is he world divided so?"
BlackNightmare: "I'm a warrior not philosopher"replied the femme"I 
never stopped to think about that... all my world was serve Unicron 
and destroy withourt mercy whatever he commanded, enjoy  the free 
time, be the best warrior  and try to get Unicron's favor... All 
those was the things that I cared"
Malice:  "What about now?  Without Unicron, what do you care about?"
Blacknightmare: "Only you  and Hellplague... besides that I don't 
have anything... You're all that I have now"
Malice:  "Then why not come with me to the Maximals?  I will mak 
sure you are treated okay, I won't let them hurt you.  I want you to 
still be with me, but I can't leave you here, not while we would be 
on opposite sides."
Blacknightmare: "I may not be welcome... I killed a bot when we 
destroyed the cannon 'cause I set the bomb, do you belive that I 
will be welcome if that bot were a Maixmal?"said the femme 
sadly "Besides... we can't be in oposite sides... we can't come back 
with Unicron, he would kill us"
Malice:  "If they will not welcome you, then I will not return to 
them."
Blacknightmare: "Even quitting to be together your sis?"
Malice:  "Even that.  I won't leave you for anything."
Blacknightmare: "Then I'll go with you to Maximnal's base"said the 
femme while she hugged him
Malice:  He hugged her, that was what he wanted.  "Good, maybe you 
and Sis will get along after you get to know each other."
Blacknightmare: the femme smiled and said"She's very honorable... 
She could have killed me when I was struck by the cyber poison but 
she seemed that she didn't do that"
Malice:  "I must meet her, she sounds like a good person, someone 
that can be relied on."  He hugged her again, feeling a little 
sleepy, and rested his head on hers.
Blacknightmare: The femme huged him
Blacknightmare: "We should plan carefully all"said kindly the femme
Malice:  "...we will.  We'll plan it all out and execute th plan 
carefully.  No suprises.
Blacknightmare: The femme nodded and touched glenty Malice's face
Malice:  The male turned and looked down at he femme, smiling as he 
reached up and touched her hand.
Blacknightmare: the femmesqueezed glenty this hadn and smiled
malice:  "What are you thinking about?" he asked, squeezing her hand 
in response.
Blacknightmare:  "The change in my life that I'll do... for you"said 
the femme
malice:  "You can always change your mind.  I don't want to push you 
into anything."
Blacknightmare: "I won't..."replied the femme" I ll  adapt to my new 
life to follow you, even if that means to be reprogramed"
Malice:  "No, no reprogramming.  They *will* accept you, here will 
be no alternative."
Blacknightmare: the femme squeezed once more Malice's hands and 
rested her head in his shoulder
Malice:  he male settled back down, feeling sleep creep up on him 
again.
Blacknightmare: the femme remain sat down close to Malice
Malice:  The male was smiling, even as he began to nod off, barely 
falling asleep and jerking his head back up before he could go to 
sleep..
Blacknighamre: The femme carefully stood up and took a blanket, she 
wrap Malice with it
